name: Thione Seck
description: '''Thione Ballago Seck''' (March 12, 1955 â€“ March 14, 2021) was a Senegalese singer and songwriter in the [[mbalakh]] genre. Seck came from a family of [[griot]] singers from the [[Wolof people|Wolof]] people of Senegal. He first performed with [[Orchestre Baobab]], but he later formed his own band, [[Raam Daan]], of which he was a member until his death in 2021.
